Definition at line 396 of file GrMeshVB.cpp.

void GrMeshVB::UploadUncached ( unsigned int  writeOffset,
const void *  source,
unsigned int  sourceSize 
)

writes data directly to the vertex buffer instead of writing to the cache, and then uploading. This can be used to achieve maximum performance. However, data must be ordered properly. See vertex-flag bit positions for proper data ordering. Data types must match the types in the above Get* functions.
